english_example_sentence: We are meeting old friends in the city center every Sunday.
russian_example_sentence: Мы встречаемся со старыми друзьями в центре города каждое воскресенье.
turkish_example_sentence: Biz her pazar günü şehir merkezinde eski dostlarla buluşuyoruz.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Biz her pazar günü şehir merkezinde eski dostlarla ______.
